name: Jewels Star Matching Game
description:
Match your way to meet the wonderful people in this puzzle adventure
Just play and enjoy for fun. We have many cute and beautiful jewels, with easy to use controls, simple and friendly graphics.
- swap and match item in group of three.
- Less moves you pass a level, higher score you'll get. Try to score high and earn 3 stars on every level.
- Make the special star down to the last line to pass the next level quickly

Do not miss your best score - do not forget to rescue the star
Thanks & Enjoy
